title: Study of Cotopaxi, Erupting, Ecuador
medium: Brush and oil, graphite on paperboard
description: The cone from which heavy smoke pours rises in the left middle plane.  A ridge stretches from left toward right, in the foreground.  Some clouds are shown above the ridge.  Blue sky with clouds.  Broad bottom margin showing the creamy ground in color. Unfinished study.
name: Drawing
